panels.description: The checkpointed size of the last checkpoint (in bytes), this metric could be different from lastCheckpointFullSize if incremental checkpoint or changelog is enabled.
panels.title: Max Total Checkpoint Count

panels.description: The total number of task slots.
panels.title: Total Task Slots

panels.description: The total number of restarts since this job was submitted, including full restarts and fine-grained restarts.
panels.title: Total Restarts

panels.description: The time it took to complete the last checkpoint (in milliseconds).
panels.title: Checkpoint Latency

panels.description: The checkpointed size of the last checkpoint (in bytes), this metric could be different from lastCheckpointFullSize if incremental checkpoint or changelog is enabled.
panels.title: Max Last Checkpoint Size of all jobs

panels.description: The number of available task slots.
panels.title: Available Task Slots

targets.expr: max(flink_jobmanager_job_numberOfFailedCheckpoints{job="flink", env="$env", flink_cluster_id=~"$flink_cluster_id", pod=~"$pod"} / flink_jobmanager_job_totalNumberOfCheckpoints{job="flink", env="$env", flink_cluster_id=~"$flink_cluster_id", pod=~"$pod"})

flink_jobmanager_job_numberOfFailedCheckpoints{job="flink", env="$env", flink_cluster_id=~"$flink_cluster_id", pod=~"$pod"} / flink_jobmanager_job_totalNumberOfCheckpoints{job="flink", env="$env", flink_cluster_id=~"$flink_cluster_id", pod=~"$pod"}

panels.description: Total Memory Used by adding used heap and non heap

targets.expr: flink_jobmanager_Status_JVM_Memory_Heap_Used{job="flink", env="$env", flink_cluster_id=~"$flink_cluster_id", pod=~"$pod"} + flink_jobmanager_Status_JVM_Memory_NonHeap_Used{job="flink", env="$env", flink_cluster_id=~"$flink_cluster_id", pod=~"$pod"}

panels.title: Total Memory Used
